title: FS/T: T206 SL'er Orth with Old Mill back SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS/T: T206 SL'er Orth with Old Mill back SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hi. Anyone want to trade? I have a SGC 40 of Al Orth with Old Mill back. I would trade even up for a SGC 40 (no creases) of Otey, Jordan, Lafitte or Ellam with OM back. Would also consider a Mike Powers SGC 50 or a SGC 40 (no creases) HOF'er portrait (will throw in cash to even out the deal). Send offers and scans to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks!
Bump to add I will also accept $100 dlv'd. Paypal, mo, check all ok.
